title: league of legends freezes in game for a few seconds
body: I have turned off game dvr on windows 10, I have updated all my drivers, I have no viruses, I have run the full repair on league and I cant find a solution. This all started since the new patch. Randomly at times my whole screen will start glitching bad with the whole screen becoming pixelated (surprised I haven't gotten a seizure from this) followed by my in-game item icons being smudge and appearing somewhere else in the screen. Right now, I have uninstalled league and reinstalling. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body:
The pixelation sounds like a lot more than the xbox game bar, and possibly a hardware or driver issue.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your pc settings.  Test it in a custom game, though!

If that doesn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help figure out why this is happening to you.
